explanation: [0-0] On a sunny beach with rolling waves, a man on the left side of the frame, holding the control bar of a kite and stepping on a black and white surfboard, while a man on the right side of the frame, barefoot, stands on the beach and looks to the front. Both are wearing black wetsuits. The background is a beach with tourists watching the sea, the ocean and some distant mountains, and some white clouds in the sky.

[0-2] The man on the right side of the frame grabs the control bar attached to the kite, jumps back forcefully, and lifts his bent legs forward. Meanwhile, the man on the left side of the frame squats down, with both hands on the black and white surfboard.

[0-2] The man on the right side of the frame grabs the control bar attached to the kite, jumps back forcefully, and lifts his bent legs forward. Meanwhile, the man on the left side of the frame squats down, with both hands on the black and white surfboard.

[2-11] As the camera moves to the right, the man on the left side of the frame pushes the surfboard in front of him, pushing it all the way up into the air above the surging waves, and then lets go. At the same time, the man on the right side of the frame floats into the air with the help of the wind, and the surfboard is temporarily out of control of his feet.
